Our Peter Pan Bus Portion of the Trip has been canceled, but, LET’S BE GREEN, AND CARPOOL FOR THOSE INTERETED. ( If you are unable to carpool, please plan to arrive and meet the group for lunch in the 12:00 ish range. ( As of today, aprox. 30 plus singles have said yes)

THE IRA’S SINGLES EVENTS

PROUDLY



PRESENTS



THE 2ND ANNUAL DAY OF PLAY



IN WINTER WONDERLAND!!!!





A BEAUTIFUL DAY OF CROSS-COUNTRY SKIING, SNOW SHOEING, AND ICE SKATING.

(And of course, warming up with delicious hot chocolate)





THE FINE PRINT BELOW:



DATE: Saturday, February 6, 2010.



LOCATION: Canterbury Farms. See: http://www.canterbury... (They did a great job for us last year)



COST





SKI PACKAGE BASED ON YOUR NEEDS AND WHAT EQUIPMENT YOU MAY OWN AS FOLLOWS:



Please Note: The Rental Fee below includes Snow Shoes and Skis, Boots and Poles and Ice Skating Rental!! Try all 3 activities in one day!!!!!!



If you have your own equipment, the only fee is for the use of their beautiful, groomed trails.



Trail Fee: $15.

Rental $15.



Group Lesson if so desired: $25 pp.



Group Package for all three: $ 50 pp. SAVE $5.



FOOD: There are cozy rooms in which to eat and relax. I suggest you pack a snack/lunch/drink etc. They do sell food as well. Your choice.











ABOUT CANTERBURY FARMS



Canterbury Farms is nestled high in the Berkshire Hills. Our trail system was specifically designed for cross-country skiing. New this year, we have widened our trails to accommodate skating. Practice your turns and stops in a wide open field, ski along brooks and stone walls and challenge your downhill skills on Outer Limits. We groom and track 12 miles of trails daily. Our northern exposure guarantees the best snow in the Berkshires.

Surrounding the Farm is two thousand acres of state and private land
